subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Novak Djokovic, one of the best men’s players never to win the French Open, often plays his best when inspired by something off the court, and his homeland, Serbia, might provide some inspiration this year at Roland Garros.
snippet: Novak Djokovic, one of the best men’s players never to win the French Open, often plays his best when inspired by something off the court, and his homeland, Serbia, might provide some inspiration this year at Roland Garros.
